title: The Social History of Agriculture
abstract: Book Review| October 01 2018 The Social History of Agriculture The Social History of Agriculture. By Christopher Isett and Stephen Miller. (Lanham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield, 2017. Pp. xvi, 387, illustrations, maps, notes, index, bibliography. Paper, $45.00.). Edward L. Bates Edward L. Bates Edward L. Bates, Ph.D., is a history instructor at Elmhurst College and the College of DuPage, both located in suburban Chicago. His dissertation, “Disposable Labor: Urban and Rural Agricultural Migrants from the Monterrey Center through the Nuevo Leon Corridor to San Antonio, 1915–1925,” was completed in 2016 at Northern Illinois University.
